scripts.dev: concurrently -k -r "npm run agent:dev" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.sync:frontend: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('frontend','dist');const dest=path.join('backend','frontend','dist');if(!fs.existsSync(src)){console.warn('No frontend dist to sync');process.exit(0);}fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest),{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('Synced frontend dist to',dest);"
scripts.agent:web: npm run build && npm run build:backend && npm run sync:frontend && node backend/dist/index.js
scripts.dist: npm run build:backend && npm run build && electron-builder
